message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000.  This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,100,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,250,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's meet in the middle.

I understand that you're willing to come down, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1,200,000. This is the highest I can go without going over my budget.
